titleStmt.title: An excellent piece of conceipted poesy, divided into two subjects, A voice from the vault, and An age for apes with other exquisite ayers, and select fancies ... and extracted from the choicest wits of our age.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne, and are to be sold by Tho. Vere ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Brathwait. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
